info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Transylvania, east central Jackson and south central Haywood Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Brevard, or 6 miles southwest of Black Balsam Area, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Black Balsam Area, Graveyard Fields, B.R. Parkway-Black Balsam To Mount Pisgah, and Wolf Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
